item.title: Data Analysis 📈 using Python 🐍
item.description: A learning path for learning data analysis using python curated by shaji-stark Why is python an excellent option for data analysis :question: :thinking: 1. Easy to learn 🤩 Python is focused on simplicity as well as readability, providing a host of helpful options for data analysts/scientists simultaneously. Thus, newbies can easily utilize its pretty simple syntax to build effective solutions even for complex scenarios. 2. Well-supported 💁‍♂️ Being in widespread use in industrial alongside academic areas, Python has a broad array of helpful libraries with tons of helpful and support materials.
